content:
FontProperty Enum

Definition

Identifies the font properties of a visual style element.

In this Article

public enum FontProperty
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
FontProperty

Remarks

The FontProperty enumeration represents a set of font properties that describe visual style elements. The FontProperty values are used as an argument in the GetFont method to specify which property value to retrieve for the element that the VisualStyleRenderer currently represents.

Fields

GlyphFont

The font that a glyph is drawn with.
